1.0.name: wordpress/participad
1.0.description:
Participad enables realtime, collaborative editing on WordPress content. Co-write and co-edit content, totally synchronously, and watch as the other people's text appears instantly on the screen.

Powered by Etherpad Lite.

Visit http://participad.org/features/ to learn more about Participad's features, or watch the following video to see Participad in action.
